Name: Litra Glow Control
Description: Control your Logitech Litra lights with your Stream Deck

com.litra.glow.v2.toggle.Name: Toggle On/Off
com.litra.glow.v2.toggle.Tooltip: Toggle ON/OFF the selected Litra light

com.litra.glow.v2.brightness.up.Name: Brightness +25 lm
com.litra.glow.v2.brightness.up.Tooltip: Increase Litra Glow brightness by 25 lumens

com.litra.glow.v2.brightness.down.Name: Brightness -25 lm
com.litra.glow.v2.brightness.down.Tooltip: Decrease Litra Glow brightness by 25 lumens

com.litra.glow.v2.temperature.up.Name: Temperature +400 K
com.litra.glow.v2.temperature.up.Tooltip: Increase Litra Glow temperature by 400 K

com.litra.glow.v2.temperature.down.Name: Temperature -400 K
com.litra.glow.v2.temperature.down.Tooltip: Decrease Litra Glow temperature by 400 K
